segments.text: I'm watching those two little rascals conspire for cookies.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: The boy is really putting himself out there, climbing so high.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: He's got one hand in the cookie jar, and the other poised with a plate.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: His sister is practically vibrating with anticipation, arm outstretched.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: They are so engrossed in their mission; it's quite a sight.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: I can't help but feel a little happy for their shared adventure, despite the risk.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: But oh, that stool is just waiting to collapse under his weight.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: The thought of him falling and hurting himself makes my heart jump.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: And the woman, still oblivious, is just polishing away.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: She's probably going to be furious when she discovers the mess and the missing cookies.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: They're breaking the rules, no doubt, but it's a classic childhood moment.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: I hope they manage to get away with at least one cookie before disaster strikes.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: It's a bold move, and they clearly know what they're doing, in their own way.
segments.speaker: PAR
